snippet: Many came to the defense of Port Authority police officers after Joseph J. Lhota, a candidate for mayor, compared them to mall cops. But no one came to the defense of the mall cops.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column observes that no one seems to come to the defense of mall cops, who are often demeaned, despite fact that they deal with many of same issues that street cops do, including muggings, thefts and fights.
lead_paragraph: Many came to the defense of Port Authority police officers after Joseph J. Lhota, a candidate for mayor, compared them to mall cops. But no one came to the defense of the mall cops.

headline.main: Protecting Cinnabon and the Gap, and Still Getting No Respect
headline.print_headline: Protecting Cinnabon, Sharper Image and the Gap, and Still Getting No Respect

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
